basic_information.scholarship_name: The Kathryn Lanay Moyer Endowed Scholarship in Psychology

description: Scholarship Mission: To provide scholarship assistance to students within the College of Education & Professional Studies who are pursuing a degree within the Psychology department. Eligibility Requirements Declared major within the Department of Psychology Demonstrate a strong passion for leadership and involvement with the department both on campus and/or within the community Demonstrates academic success in their program Selection Process Recipients of the scholarship will be selected by a departmental committee Award Requirements Must be enrolled in the upcoming fall and spring semester to receive award Attendance at an awards banquet is required for all recipients Recipients must write a thank you letter to the donors of the scholarship

general_criteria.description: Soft requirements that provide additional points/consideration

hard_criteria.description: Hard requirements that must be met to qualify for the scholarship
